tweet_text: @scottfgray @ChrisSSims Yeah, this strikes the nail on the head for me. For sensitive topics like slavery, sexual predation, etc., including them as an evil thing is still including them. It's still a story you're setting out to tell. So it's got to have a good reason, and you need buy-in from players.
